JobTitle: PDM Consulting Epic Web Watchdog Analyst-Core Business Operations
JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? An industry solutions professional who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced (Skillset example - Healthcare Solutions) you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. If so, consider an opportunity with Deloitte under our Project Delivery Talent Model. Project Delivery Model (PDM) is a talent model that is tailored specifically for long-term, onsite client service delivery. PDM practitioners are local to project locations, minimizing extensive travel, and provides you with a full career path within the firm. Work you'll do/Responsibilities  Industry-leading clients. An award-winning culture. Top notch connections. Big opportunities. At Deloitte, you'll work with the best in the business to solve the toughest problems in business. From learning to leadership, this is your chance to take your career to the next level.  Project activities includes but not restricted to :  - Provide Epic system Tier-2 Application support and assist in implementation of Epic web and watchdog for the client  - Support system activities- Maintenance, Incident Management, Production Support (manage and monitor module specific activities, resolve any issues) and Minor Enhancements  - Help client with strategic project implementations, coordination, system confiuration and testing  - Implement web and virtual health applications like Haiku, Canto, Watchdog  Apply technical expertise in identifying, troubleshooting, and resolving issues logged in by clients.  Analse, identify and advise any workflow changes and document the same  Complete time bound Maintenance activities that includes but not limited to Daily monitoring of batches;  Regular communication with client and project leadership to ensure smooth functioning of project  Supports the stability, availability, and performance of enterprise systems (e.g., systems, applications, network, databases, storage, security) by performing analysis to identify problems, trends, and opportunities for improvement. The Team  The US Core Industry Solutions Offering encompasses industry vertical, sector specific solutions that leverage distinct technologies to drive operational change and automate the core our client's business. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions. Qualifications Required 1: Minimum of 3 + years of related Epic Web, Watchdog experience  2: Epic Web or Watchdog module certified  3: Knowledge on web application or virtual health implementation and support  4: Understanding of Epic application workflows  College Degree or equivalent:  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Business Management, Information Services or an equivalent combination of education, skills and relevant experience OR equivalent education/experience  MINUMIM YEARS OF EXPERINCE   3+ years of Industry experience especially in Epic Tapestry projects   Preferred Qualifications:  1: Haiku, Canto working experience  2: Web Services, API integration  3: Interfaces understanding Limited sponsorship may be available How you'll grow  At Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there's always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career.  #LI-CONS  #IND:CONS
